title: Name Taken by Game
body:
So I haven't played in a couple years and decided to get back into it because a friend just got an account. So i go through the pains of remember/changing passwords and when I get in I see that my name is well this "1PRJ9YAR7D" and i'm like wtf?!?! So I see that you do have a chance to loose your name if youre out for some time and if they pick yours. Thats cool and all I can understand that, but why don't you get a free name change?! The game practically stole my name TT 
So now i have to grind 13k ip which for a lvl ten i think is impossible or fork out 5 bucks.

So i'm to raise awareness to riot to give people a break and give them a free name change if their name was taken.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may have experienced an issue with the inactive summoner name system. You were meant to pick a new summoner name when you logged back in after your period of inactivity. In order to get this resolved quickly, I recommend you reach out to our game specialists by [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
